member.name: T:ViDi2.RawImage
member.summary: Represents an image in unmanaged memory

member.name: M:ViDi2.RawImage.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,ViDi2.ImageChannelDepth,System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a newinstance with the given image dimensions and pixel-data The memory is NOT managed by this object. It is just a wrapper around unmanaged memory
